mapper.sql: wisd.stocktaking_det_id, wisd.stocktaking_id, wisd.contract_code, wisd.pallet_code, wisd.material_id, wisd.storage_id, wisd.book_inventory, wisd.counted_quantity, wisd.profit_loss_quantity, wisd.profit_loss_rate, wisd.delivery_rate, wisd.price, wisd.profit_loss_amount, wisd.`status`, wisd.remark, wisd.organization_id, wisd.create_user_id, wisd.create_time, wisd.modified_user_id, wisd.modified_time, wisd.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , sm.material_code,sm.material_name,sm.material_desc, bo.organization_name,bo.organization_code, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, ss.storage_name,ss.storage_code, swa.warehouse_area_id,swa.warehouse_area_code,swa.warehouse_area_name, sw.warehouse_id,sw.warehouse_code,sw.warehouse_name, spm.product_model_code,spm.product_model_name, wis.stocktaking_code,suss.user_name AS stockist_name from fantech_imes.wms_inner_stocktaking_det wisd LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON wisd.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON wisd.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_material sm ON wisd.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_tab bt ON bt.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm ON bt.product_model_id = spm.product_model_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_storage ss ON wisd.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse_area swa ON ss.warehouse_area_id = swa.warehouse_area_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse sw ON swa.warehouse_id = sw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON wisd.organization_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.wms_inner_stocktaking wis ON wis.stocktaking_id = wisd.stocktaking_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user suss ON wis.stockist_id = suss.user_id
and wisd.stocktaking_id=#{stocktakingId}
and wis.stocktaking_code like CONCAT("%",#{stocktakingCode},"%")
and date_format(wisd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sm.material_code like CONCAT("%",#{materialCode},"%")
and sm.material_name like CONCAT("%",#{materialName},"%")
and wisd.contract_code like CONCAT("%",#{contractCode},"%")
and wisd.pallet_code like CONCAT("%",#{palletCode},"%")
and wisd.delivery_rate = 0
and wisd.delivery_rate > 0
and wisd.delivery_rate < 0
and wis.stockist_id=#{stockistId}
and wits.status=#{status}
and suss.user_name like CONCAT("%",#{stockistName},"%")
order by wisd.create_time desc
